creator: masonjm@ah.org
text:
The big change is caching is now handled within to Store to allow for preemptive
cache refreshing. There's also some general cleanup and better logging.

I'm just going to attach a new file rather than a patch. The changes were
extensive enough that I couldn't make any sense out of the diff. I've copied the
copyright boilerplate and Oliver's fix to retrieveRevisionContent(). I also
changed the copyright in the boilerplate from "1999-2002" to "1999-2004". I'm
not sure if I'm supposed to do that, but I thought it made sense ;).

creator: masonjm@ah.org
text:
Created attachment 12007
A factory class for getting a Singleton EHCache CacheManager.
